description: This table contains the assigned pools for an imaging order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the assigned radiology pools for an order.

columns.name: RAD_ASGN_PLS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the assigned pools for an order.

columns.name: RAD_ASGN_PLS_ID_POOL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the scheduling pool used when searching for available providers for an appointment.
